pageContext.claim: “Thousands of beautiful American lives like Sarah's have been stolen [by illegal immigrants] for the simple reason that our government has refused to enforce already existing laws.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump consistently, and incorrectly, links illegal immigration with crime. In this case, Trump is referring to crime in sanctuary cities. The limited research on sanctuary cities and crime either found no statistically significant impact of sanctuary policies on crime, or a reduction in crime due to immigrant-friendly policing strategies. Sanctuary jurisdictions release inmates after their criminal case is complete, and extensive research shows noncitizens are not more prone to criminality than U.S.-born citizens.
